db:abstract.db:para: A specialized MultiPointTouchArea for collecting touch input data.
This type was introduced in QtQuick.VirtualKeyboard 2.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type handles the trace interaction between the touch screen and the input engine.
The traces are rendered using the delegate from the current style KeyboardStyle.traceCanvasDelegate.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] boundingBox : rect
db:section.db:para: Bounding box for the trace input.
This property is readonly and is automatically updated based on the item size and margins.

db:section.db:title: canvasType : string
db:section.db:para: Canvas type of this trace input area.

This property can be used to distinguish between different types of canvases. For example, in full screen handwriting mode this property is set to "fullscreen", and in keyboard handwriting mode this property is set to "keyboard".

db:section.db:title: horizontalRulers : var
db:section.db:para: List of horizontal rulers in the input area.
The rulers are defined as a number of pixels from the top edge of the boundingBox.

db:section.db:title: patternRecognitionMode : int
db:section.db:para: Pattern recognition mode of this input area.

db:section.db:title: verticalRulers : var
db:section.db:para: List of vertical rulers in the input area.
The rulers are defined as a number of pixels from the left edge of the boundingBox.
